page.title: 09HEALTH IN THE DUDLEY AREA
page.content: Our one general hospital, called{ {Russells Hall Hospital}opened officially in 1984 and cost Â£25 m to build. It is the only hospital to have an accident and emergency department and deals with approximately 6000 people each month. The hospital has 400 beds in 16 wards for in-patients and a large out-patients department. Emergencies dealt with range from home accidents to major road-traffic accidents. Schools in Dudley have a visiting nurse who looks for nits and veruccas. She will visit homes to see children who are very ill or who may have been the victim of child abuse. Many children are not properly cared for and she keeps an eye on them. The { {School Dentist}checks teeth in school and then treats children at a local clinic.
